name: @lukuangchen/smol-translator
description: Translate SMoL programs to other programming languages

scripts.prepare-test: npm run prepare-test:get-programs && npm run prepare-test:translate
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run prepare-test && npm run run-test
scripts.import-tutorials: echo 'export const tutorials =' > test/tutorials.js; cat ../smol-tutor/src/tutorials.json >> test/tutorials.js
